memberdef.name: CUGRAPH_EXPECTS
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (!(cond)) { \ std::string msg{}; \ SET_ERROR_MSG(msg, "cuGraph failure at ", fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__); \ throw cugraph::logic_error(msg); \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Macro for checking (pre-)conditions that throws an exception when a condition is false.

parameterdescription.para: Expression that evaluates to true or false
String literal description of the reason that cond is expected to be true with optinal format tagas
if the condition evaluates to false.

memberdef.name: CUGRAPH_FAIL
memberdef.initializer: do { \ std::string msg{}; \ SET_ERROR_MSG(msg, "cuGraph failure at ", fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__); \ throw cugraph::logic_error(msg); \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Indicates that an erroneous code path has been taken.

parameterdescription.para: String literal description of the reason that this code path is erroneous with optinal format tagas
